column4: UPDATE 2-RBS investment bank boss's departure announced after a month in the job
column5: LONDON  March 30 Royal Bank of Scotland  executive Rory Cullinan is to leave its investment bank at the end of April  the state-backed lender said only a month after putting him in charge of the business.

column4: RBS investment bank boss goes after disagreement on strategy implementation -source
column5: LONDON  March 30 Royal Bank of Scotland  executive Rory Cullinan left as head of its investment bank after a disagreement over the implementation of strategy  a person familiar with the matter said.

column4: Europe Factors to Watch-Shares set to rise; techs in focus
column5: PARIS  March 30 European stocks were set to rise on Monday  bouncing back from last week's losses with tech shares in focus after news of merger talks in the sector spurred a late-session rally on Wall Street on Friday. column5: PARIS French pharmaceutical company Sanofi has examined acquisitions opportunities but does not view deal-making as "indispensable" to its future  its chairman told French paper Les Echos in an interview.

column4: Toyota to roll out low-cost automated braking safety packages
column5: March 30 Toyota Motor Sales U.S.A Inc  a unit of Toyota Motor Corp  said it would offer low-cost automated braking safety packages to U.S. customers as an optional accessory for all its Toyota and Lexus cars by the end of 2017.

column4: SEC says Wal-Mart can omit shareholder proposal on staff 'engagement'
column5: Wal-Mart Stores Inc said it would omit a shareholder proposal that sought to link executive pay to a measure of staff motivation from a vote at its annual meeting in June after the U.S. securities regulator ruled in the retailer's favor.

column4: UPDATE 1-Moroccan royal holding firm SNI's 2014 profit falls 42 pct
column5: RABAT  March 30 Morocco's National Investment Co.  an investment holding firm controlled by the country's monarchy  posted a 42.3 percent fall in 2014 net profit  it said on Monday  after selling stakes in the food industry to focus on other sectors such as energy.
